text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Sunday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
King Hassan calls for consensus at opening of parliament; pledges to put personal support behind fair and transparent elections.
Morocco and Canada sign partnership draft agreement to promote trade and investment.
King Hassan gives parliament vision of alternating political power, with two groups balanced by a central party.
Moroccan fisherman to appear in Tangier court after two drown and 25 immigrants trying to enter Spain illegally disappear after shipwreck.
King Hassan urges parliament to seek consensus over new electoral and regional laws.
Morocco and France to reinforce legal cooperation to battle drug traffic.
